docs.snippet: MONTEVIDEO, Sept. 8.--Uruguay's recent adoption of a high tariff measure, which now has developed into discrimination against the United States, has brought a friendly notification from the American Minister here that retaliation is possible.
docs.lead_paragraph: MONTEVIDEO, Sept. 8.--Uruguay's recent adoption of a high tariff measure, which now has developed into discrimination against the United States, has brought a friendly notification from the American Minister here that retaliation is possible.
docs.abstract: Amer Min gives Govt friendly notification that U S can retaliate against discriminatory measures; Uruguayans protest against prohibitive duties on Amer goods
